abstract: Carolina Panthers revoke their nonexclusive franchise tag offer to All-Pro cornerback Josh Norman, who becomes unrestricted free agent; other pro football news noted.

headline.main: Josh Norman Now a Free Agent

snippet: The All-Pro cornerback became an unrestricted free agent after the Carolina Panthers surprisingly rescinded their nonexclusive franchise tag offer.
lead_paragraph: The All-Pro cornerback became an unrestricted free agent after the Carolina Panthers surprisingly rescinded their nonexclusive franchise tag offer.
